mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inference_log ( ADMISSION_ID, INF_DIV, INF_VALUE, REG_DT, LOG_DT ) select admission_id ,inf_div ,inf_value ,reg_dt ,NOW() from inference where INF_DIV = #{infDiv}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ADMISSION_ID /* 나이 */ , YEAR(NOW())-LEFT(P.BIRTH_DATE,4) + 1 AS AGE /* 맥박수 심박수 */ , IFNULL(T2.PR, 0) AS PR /* 체온 */ , IFNULL(ROUND(T2.BT, 1), 0) AS BT , IFNULL(ROUND(T2.SPO2, 1), 0) AS SPO2 , IFNULL((SELECT '1' FROM INTERVIEW I INNER JOIN INTERVIEW_DETAIL ID ON I.INTERVIEW_SEQ = ID.INTERVIEW_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND I.INTERVIEW_TYPE ='01' AND ID.ANSWER_SEQ = '54' AND ID.ANSWER_VALUE LIKE '%2%' AND I.ADMISSION_ID = A.ADMISSION_ID), 0 ) AS HYP FROM ADMISSION A INNER JOIN PATIENT P ON A.PATIENT_ID = P.PATIENT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ADMISSION_ID ,IFNULL(MAX(BT),0) BT ,IFNULL(MAX(PR),0) PR ,IFNULL(MAX(SPO2),0) SPO2 FROM ( SELECT R.ADMISSION_ID ,MAX(RD.RESULT) BT ,'' PR ,'' SPO2 FROM `RESULT` R INNER JOIN RESULT_DETAIL RD ON R.RESULT_SEQ = RD.RESULT_SEQ WHERE R.ITEM_ID ='I0002' AND RESULT_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY R.ADMISSION_ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ADMISSION_ID ,'' BT ,MAX(RESULT) PR ,'' SPO2 FROM `RESULT` R INNER JOIN RESULT_DETAIL RD ON R.RESULT_SEQ = RD.RESULT_SEQ WHERE R.ITEM_ID ='I0001' AND RESULT_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY R.ADMISSION_ID UNION ALL SELECT R.ADMISSION_ID ,'' BT ,'' PR ,MAX(RESULT) SPO2 FROM `RESULT` R INNER JOIN RESULT_DETAIL RD ON R.RESULT_SEQ = RD.RESULT_SEQ WHERE R.ITEM_ID ='I0003' AND RESULT_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY R.ADMISSION_ID ) T1 GROUP BY ADMISSION_ID ) T2 ON A.ADMISSION_ID = T2.ADMISSION_ID WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.ADMISSION_ID

SELECT A.ADMISSION_ID ,SUM(CASE WHEN T1.ITEM_ID='I0006' THEN T1.BIO_RESULT ELSE 0 END) RR ,SUM(CASE WHEN T1.ITEM_ID='I0001' THEN T1.BIO_RESULT ELSE 0 END) BT ,SUM(CASE WHEN T1.ITEM_ID='I0002' THEN T1.BIO_RESULT ELSE 0 END) PR ,IFNULL(Q1_YN,0) Q1_YN ,IFNULL(Q2_YN,0) Q2_YN ,IFNULL(Q3_YN,0) Q3_YN ,IFNULL(Q4_YN,0) Q4_YN ,IFNULL(Q5_YN,0) Q5_YN ,IFNULL(Q6_YN,0) Q6_YN FROM ADMISSION A INNER JOIN PATIENT P ON A.PATIENT_ID = P.PATIENT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ADMISSION_ID , ITEM_ID, ROUND(AVG(RESULT),2) BIO_RESULT FROM RESULT R INNER JOIN RESULT_DETAIL RD ON R.RESULT_SEQ = RD.RESULT_SEQ WHERE R.ITEM_ID IN ('I0002', 'I0006', 'I0001') AND CONCAT(RESULT_DATE, ' ', RESULT_TIME) BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 HOUR) AND NOW() GROUP BY R.ADMISSION_ID, R.ITEM_ID ) T1 ON A.ADMISSION_ID = T1.ADMISSION_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T1.ADMISSION_ID ,GROUP_CONCAT(IF(ANSWER_SEQ = '38', ANSWER_VALUE, NULL)) AS Q1_YN ,GROUP_CONCAT(IF(ANSWER_SEQ = '50', ANSWER_VALUE, NULL)) AS Q2_YN ,GROUP_CONCAT(IF(ANSWER_SEQ = '55', ANSWER_VALUE, NULL)) AS Q3_YN ,GROUP_CONCAT(IF(ANSWER_SEQ = '58', ANSWER_VALUE, NULL)) AS Q4_YN ,GROUP_CONCAT(IF(ANSWER_SEQ = '48', ANSWER_VALUE, NULL)) AS Q5_YN ,GROUP_CONCAT(IF(ANSWER_SEQ = '60', ANSWER_VALUE, NULL)) AS Q6_YN FROM ( SELECT I.ADMISSION_ID ,ID.ANSWER_SEQ ,ID.ANSWER_VALUE FROM INTERVIEW I INNER JOIN INTERVIEW_DETAIL ID ON I.INTERVIEW_SEQ = ID.INTERVIEW_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND I.INTERVIEW_TYPE ='02' AND ID.ANSWER_SEQ IN ('38','50','55','58','48','60') AND I.INTERVIEW_SEQ = (SELECT X.INTERVIEW_SEQ FROM INTERVIEW X WHERE X.INTERVIEW_TYPE ='02' AND X.ADMISSION_ID = I.ADMISSION_ID ORDER BY X.INTERVIEW_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) T1 GROUP BY T1.ADMISSION_ID ) T2 ON A.ADMISSION_ID = T2.ADMISSION_ID WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ADMISSION_ID
